data.title: ONE Championship: Nabil says kickboxing is ‘easier than Muay Thai’, plans ‘something special’ for Petchtanong
data.description: Nabil Anane admits he is the underdog against “master” Petchtanong Petchfergus at ONE Fight Night 26 next week in Bangkok – but feels kickboxing is “easier than Muay Thai”, and warns the former champ he has “something special” planned.

data.title: Port progress, Kirins revive ACL 2 hopes
data.description: Thai League 1 giants Port sealed progression to the knockout stage of the AFC Champions League Two after a 2-2 draw with Persib Bandung in Group F on Thursday night at BG Stadium.

data.title: Ayaka Miura wants ONE Championship title shot – against Stamp Fairtex or Xiong Jingnan
data.description: Japanese MMA star Ayaka Miura wants a ONE Championship title shot after her latest victory – whether it’s Xiong Jingnan or Stamp Fairtex.

data.title: Dechapol and Supissara storm into Syed Modi quarters
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran advanced to the quarter-finals of the US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow yesterday.

data.title: Kipchoge joins Thailand Marathon
data.description: Marathon legend Eliud Kipchoge of Kenya is set to take part in the 7th Amazing Thailand Marathon Bangkok on Sunday.

data.title: Angels advance to last 16 despite defeat
data.description: Bangkok United are assured of a berth in the last 16 of the AFC Champions League Two despite a 1-0 defeat at Tampines Rovers on Wednesday night.

data.title: ONE Championship: Petchtanong warns Nabil ‘don’t underestimate me’ at Fight Night 26
data.description: Petchtanong Petchfergus  insists his three decades of experience will prove the difference against Nabil Anane at  ONE Fight Night 25  next week.

data.title: Dechapol and Supissara enter round two
data.description: Mixed doubles players Dechapol Puavaranukroh and Supissara Paewsampran moved into the second round of the US$210,000 BWF Syed Modi India International 2024 in Lucknow on Wednesday.

data.title: Thailand gear up for title defence with star-studded side
data.description: Supachok Sarachat and his brother Suphanat Mueanta were named in the 26-player squad for the upcoming AFF Mitsubishi Electric Cup on Wednesday.

data.title: ONE Championship ‘my dream’ says Morocco’s Abdelali Zahidi after stunning debut head kick KO
data.description: Morocco’s new Muay Thai sensation Abdelali Zahidi is determined to leave his mark in ONE Championship after a stunning debut knockout last weekend in Bangkok.

data.title: ONE Championship rankings snub irks Younes Rabah – ‘I deserve it’
data.description: Younes Rabah has hit out at his exclusion from the ONE Championship featherweight Muay Thai rankings after recently making a winning debut in the division.

data.title: Buriram clash with Kawasaki Frontale in ACL Elite
data.description: Thai champions Buriram United will be eager to make amends for the heavy AFC Champions League Elite defeat they suffered a few weeks ago when they take on Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday.

data.title: Leicester City sack manager Cooper after winless run
data.description: Leicester City have sacked manager Steve Cooper following a poor run of form, the Premier League club announced on Sunday after a winless run left them hovering two points above the relegation zone.

data.title: Bangkok's title hopes hit by Muang Thong setback
data.description: Leaders Bangkok United on Saturday night suffered a shock 2-1 defeat at Muang Thong United that could eventually cost them their dream of winning a maiden Thai League 1 title.

data.title: Buriram get the better of Sukhothai
data.description: Defending champions Buriram United moved to within three points of Thai League 1 leaders Bangkok United following a 2-0 victory over Sukhothai at home on Friday night.

data.title: Leicester woes continue with loss to Chelsea
data.description: LEICESTER, England - Goals from Nicolas Jackson and Enzo Fernandez helped Chelsea to a 2-1 Premier League win at Leicester City on Saturday that would have been more comfortable if Blues winger Noni Madueke had not blocked teammate Cole Palmer’s goalbound shot.

data.title: ONE Friday Fights 88: Zahidi’s head-kick KO highlights early slew of finishes and bonuses
data.description: Abdelali Zahidi’s stunning head-kick KO was the highlight of an action-packed international portion of last night’s ONE Friday Fights 88 card in Bangkok, amid a slew of early finishes and bonuses.

data.title: Conor McGregor, UFC fighter, is held liable for sexual assault in Ireland
data.description: DUBLIN — A woman who had accused mixed martial arts (MMA) fighter Conor McGregor of raping her in a hotel penthouse in 2018 was awarded nearly 250,000 euros (about US$260,000) in damages Friday after a jury found him liable for sexual assault in a civil trial in Dublin.
